name: Neopets: Island Builders
description:
Build, Craft, Discover!

BUILD YOUR TOWN: Create homes, workshops, restaurants, parks, and more! Landscape your town however you’d like with a variety of trees, stores, and statues. With 70+ furniture items and over 100 crafting recipes (and more on the way!), you’ll have everything you need to perfectly build your town.


CRAFT TOOLS: Create and use tools to gather resources, craft beautiful decorations, and make unique hats and colorful paintbrushes!



COLLECT AND CUSTOMIZE PETS: Your Neopets are here to help you rebuild Dacardia! Each species has its own unique personality. Customize your pets with paintbrushes and dress them up in cool hats!


EXPAND YOUR CITY: Explore grassy fields, sandy beaches, and ancient jungles! You’ll discover new biomes and regions to build in as you progress through the game. New areas will be added in future updates!


SOLVE MYSTERIES: Investigate the mystery behind the storm that destroyed Dacardia. Was it a natural disaster, or was something more sinister at work…? Experience the twists and turns of an all-new Neopian storyline!
